name: Prediction Stick
imagePrompt: A sleek, futuristic paddle with glowing Orb logos, used for hitting a digital 'Yes' or 'No' button on a screen, with a playful glint.
abilityText: After your hero attacks, restore 2 Health. 'I predicted all of this.'
flavorText: Right 50% of the time, every time. The other 50%? Market manipulation, obviously.

weaponEffect.description: After your hero attacks, restore 2 Health.
